Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -20,10 +20,9 @@

Hourly Rate: $40-$66

Level: Expert

Estimated Time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week

Location: United States Only

-

We’re producing a broadcast television series focused on science, health, and longevity — and we’re looking for a talented AI-native video editor and motion graphics creator to join our post-production team on a freelance basis. This role - is ideal for someone who’s fluent in generative video tools and can quickly produce visual segments that enhance storytelling.

+

We’re producing a broadcast television series focused on science, health, and longevity — and we’re looking for a talented AI-native video editor and motion graphics creator to join our post-production team on a freelance basis. This role is ideal for someone who’s fluent in generative video tools and can quickly produce visual segments that enhance storytelling.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Use generative tools (Runway, Pika, Genmo, ElevenLabs, etc.) to create visuals, motion graphics, or B-roll elements
  • Generate photos and art that can be then broken down into Photoshop layers to be animated

Give us a quote (in phases) for a software that -pulls data streams from a website, google analytics, google ads, meta, google business page and shows data in a central dashboard like zoho, with recommendations that can be implemented in a click. You will collaborate with our team to develop tailored solutions that enhance content marketing efforts, drive engagement, and improve brand visibility. I've worked in the entertainment industry for 30 years and the software for film budgeting hasn't evolved or improved at all during this time. -We are seeking a talented AI developer to help us create innovative budgeting software tailored specifically for the film and TV industry. The ideal candidate will have experience in AI and machine learning, and a passion for enhancing financial tools. -I have experience with UI/UX and know what I'd like to build...I want to simply be able to upload a PDF of a film script, and then have an AI model create a general framework of a budget(I have many budgets to train from), then the AI will simply ask -a bunch of questions, refining the budget along the way, seeing it change on-screen in real time. You'll work closely with me to integrate advanced algorithms that streamline budgeting processes, making them more efficient and user-friendly. Level: Intermediate

Estimated Time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week

Location: United States Only

-

We are seeking a talented freelancer to create three photorealistic images using generative AI. The first image should feature a realistic model, while the other two should depict specific scenes that effectively highlight the product's use case. The ideal candidate should have experience with generative AI tools and a strong portfolio showcasing their design capabilities. If you are passionate about creating stunning visuals that tell a story, we would love to see your work and discuss this project further.

+

We are seeking a talented freelancer to create three photorealistic images using generative AI. If you are passionate about creating stunning visuals that tell a story, we would love to see your work + and discuss this project further.

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
Jobs You Might Like

  • Photorealistic Image Creation Using Generative AI

    Hourly Rate: $15-$30

    Level: Intermediate

    Estimated Time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week

    Location: United States Only

    We are seeking a talented freelancer to create three photorealistic images using generative AI. The first image should feature a realistic model, while the other two should depict specific scenes that effectively highlight the product's use case. The ideal candidate should have experience with generative AI tools and a strong portfolio showcasing their design capabilities. If you are passionate about creating stunning visuals that tell a story, we would love to see your work and discuss this project further.

    Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Midjourney AI, AI Image Generation, AI Image Generator, Computer Vision, Neural Network, TensorFlow, Artificial Intelligence

    Payment Verified: Yes

    Rating: 5.0 out of 5

    Amount Spent: $3K+

    Proposals: Less than 5

    Posted: Yesterday

  • Freelance AI Video Creator & Editor (Broadcast TV Series)

    Hourly Rate: $40-$66

    Level: Expert

    Estimated Time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week

    Location: United States Only

    We’re producing a broadcast television series focused on science, health, and longevity — and we’re looking for a talented AI-native video editor and motion graphics creator to join our post-production team on a freelance basis. This role is ideal for someone who’s fluent in generative video tools and can quickly produce visual segments that enhance storytelling.

    Key Responsibilities:

    • Use generative tools (Runway, Pika, Genmo, ElevenLabs, etc.) to create visuals, motion graphics, or B-roll elements
    • Generate photos and art that can be then broken down into Photoshop layers to be animated
    • Collaborate with editors and producers to integrate content seamlessly into episodes
    • Engineer prompts and refine outputs for quality and consistency
    • Prepare versioned or localized outputs as needed

    Ideal Candidate:

    • Strong portfolio or reel with examples of generative video or motion design
    • Comfortable with tools like Runway, Pika, Genmo, Sora, Stable Diffusion, etc.
    • Experience with editing tools like Premiere Pro, Resolve, or Final Cut
    • Understands narrative pacing, polish, and tone appropriate for TV
    • Self-starter who can take a brief and run with it — but also collaborate with a team

    Project Details:

    • Type: Freelance (Ongoing, episodic support)
    • Location: Remote
    • Start Date: ASAP
    • Rate: $400–$600/day (or per segment, negotiable based on scope & experience)
    • Duration: Project-based with potential for longer-term collaboration

    To apply, please submit:

    1. A short message describing your experience with generative video tools
    2. A portfolio or reel showcasing relevant work
    3. Your availability and preferred rate structure

    We’re excited to work with someone who’s passionate about the future of video and ready to help push the boundaries of storytelling with AI.

    Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Runway Gen-2, Sora, Genmo, Pika, Generative AI, AI Video Creation, Midjourney AI, Animation

    Payment Verified: No

    Rating: 0 out of 5

    Amount Spent: $0

    Proposals: 5 to 10

    Posted: Yesterday

We’re a European sports retailer exploring the use of AI and machine learning to solve business problems—specifically inventory optimization. We’re looking for a skilled developer to help build an image classification model using Google’s Teachable Machine that identifies products as fast-moving or slow-moving based on images. This prototype will be used to demonstrate AI capabilities to our leadership team. moreabout "Ai developer, machine learning" Skills Artificial IntelligenceMachine LearningArtificial Neural Network Payment unverified Rating is 0 out of 5. $0 spent United States Proposals: 15 to 20 Posted 2 weeks ago automated workflows with AI Job feedback automated workflows with AI Save job automated workflows with AI Fixed-price - Intermediate - Est.
